name: Tanks3D (Dimkarpenko)
description:
Tanks3D game is a 3D remake of the famous game "Battle City" from Dendy made as an experiment. All the graphics was hand crafted with Blender software, so that the overall feel and look of the game will be the same as original 2D game.

• Game aim:

    Destroy enemy tanks and capture their base

Original game screenshot

• Languages:

  Russian,English(in developing)

• Credits:

https://www.python.org/ - Python (programming language)
https://www.ursinaengine.org - Ursina Engine (3d game engine)  
https://github.com/Dimkarpenko/Tanks3D - Source Code
